snippet: A clinical Milos Raonic stormed past Gael Monfils 6-3 3-6 6-3 6-4 under the closed roof at Rod Laver Arena to reach the semi-finals of the Australian Open for the first time on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: A clinical Milos Raonic stormed past Gael Monfils 6-3 3-6 6-3 6-4 under the closed roof at Rod Laver Arena to reach the semi-finals of the Australian Open for the first time on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Ruthless Raonic Takes Canada Into Final Four at Melbourne
headline.main: Ruthless Raonic Takes Canada Into Final Four at Melbourne
